periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 40 overnight. East southeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am, then rain likely and patchy fog between 8am and 10am, then a chance of rain and patchy fog between 10am and 4pm. Cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 48 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. North northwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 40. North wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 43. Northeast wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 9pm, then rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 31. Northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Cloudy, with a high near 36. North northeast wind 6 to 10 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight, then a slight chance of snow and a slight chance of freezing rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. North northeast wind around 10 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow and a chance of freezing rain before noon, then freezing rain likely and rain and snow likely. Cloudy, with a high near 34. North northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Freezing rain likely and rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. North northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 34. North northwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 44. East southeast wind around 8 mph.
